function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of specific diagnostic techniques for early detection of SARS-CoV-2 virus","Impact":"Delay in identifying and isolating infected individuals, leading to potential spread of the virus","Mitigation":"Develop and implement rapid and accurate diagnostic techniques for early detection of SARS-CoV-2 virus","Technologies":"Advanced PCR tests, nucleic acid amplification tests (NAAT)","People":"Public, healthcare workers","Owner":"Health organizations, research institutions"},{"Description":"Inadequate screening protocols and guidelines for COVID-19 testing","Impact":"Ineffective identification and isolation of infected individuals, contributing to virus transmission","Mitigation":"Regularly review and update screening protocols based on the latest information and local situations","Technologies":"Advanced screening protocols, real-time information systems","People":"Public health authorities, healthcare workers","Owner":"World Health Organization, local health authorities"},{"Description":"Lack of serologic tests for COVID-19","Impact":"Inability to assess past exposure and immunity in individuals, hindering effective control measures","Mitigation":"Develop and deploy serologic tests for COVID-19 to assess past exposure and immunity in individuals","Technologies":"Serologic testing, antibody detection assays","People":"Public, healthcare organizations","Owner":"Health research institutions, diagnostic test manufacturers"}]}
